headline: Principal Asset Management℠ launches Capital Appreciation Select ETF
summary: DES MOINES, Iowa, March 27, 2025--Principal Asset Management℠ announced the launch of the Principal Capital Appreciation Select ETF (LCAP). This ETF will be managed by Principal Edge, an investment team within Principal Asset Management overseeing $21.1 billion in AUM1. With ongoing market volatility, the case for active equity ETFs — particularly those with large-cap U.S. exposure — is growing stronger.
